ruleset.name: Apex Documentation Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex documentation standards

rule.name: SingleLineDocumentationFormat
rule.message: ApexDoc comments must be properly formatted: single-line comments need spaces after /** and before */, multi-line comments should only be used when necessary
rule.description:
Single-line ApexDoc comments must be formatted with spaces: /** comment */ not /**comment*/. Multi-line ApexDoc comments should only be used when the content genuinely requires multiple lines. This ensures consistent formatting and prevents unnecessary multi-line comments for simple documentation.
Version: 1.0.1
